channel.title: Help Adding ::eat command
channel.description:
I currently am helping a friend code pkedisle a rs2e base, and it's rather confusing, but I'm getting the hang of it, unfortunately I cannot figure out how the hell to add an ::eat command. Basically I want the command to be like ::eat PLAYERNAME and it kills that player...
I've got the command in there, and have rights set for admins only, but I need it to actually kill them... help plz?

item.title: Help Adding ::eat command
item.dc:creator: @hah_bah_gee hah bah gee
item.description:
@hah_bah_gee wrote:

lol very good point but that wouldn’t even work in rs2e, it would have to be like pi.addItem(p, ITEMHERE, AMM HERE)

Read full topic

item.title: Help Adding ::eat command
item.dc:creator: @Thang Thang
item.description:
@Thang wrote:

What if it gives you items to kill them?

Read full topic

item.title: Help Adding ::eat command
item.dc:creator: @hah_bah_gee hah bah gee
item.description:
@hah_bah_gee wrote:

First of all that will not work in rs2e anyways, if it was a normal server i could have made myself a code, this is rs2e source, which means that POS wont work. secondly wth would I want it to spawn me an item for, I want it to kill them not give me items… phail, read next time!

Read full topic

item.title: Help Adding ::eat command
item.dc:creator: @suomirunee suomirunee
item.description:
@suomirunee wrote:

[quote=“pkinnubpk, post:2, topic:224455”]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“eat”))
{
sendMessage(“Message here”);
additem(“item id, amount”)
}[/quote]He did not ask for that beginner code, read his post first before posting…[quote=“hah bah gee, post:1, topic:224455”]I currently am helping a friend code pkedisle a rs2e base, and it’s rather confusing, but I’m getting the hang of it, unfortunately I cannot figure out how the hell to add an ::eat command. Basically I want the command to be like ::eat PLAYERNAME and it kills that player…

I’ve got the command in there, and have rights set for admins only, but I need it to actually kill them… help plz?[/quote] Ok, you read it? Good. Now should know what he wants.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Adding ::eat command
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“eat”))
{
sendMessage(“Message here”);
additem(“item id, amount”)
}

Read full topic
